description.raw:
Changes made to match the new [Task message fields](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim/src/7e12e7debaf46229baf397b398924167648e9a5e/msg/Task.msg?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) in the new release of srcsim 0.6.0.

Also started monitoring Score data.

Note this PR changes the JSON data that will be posted back to the portal.

~~~
{
  round_1: {
    tasks: [{
      current_checkpoint: 3,
      start_time: 0.0,
      elapsed_time: 0.0,
      timed_out: false,
      finished: false,
      checkpoint_durations: [0.0, 0.0],
      checkpoint_penalties: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
      }, null, null]
    score: 0,
    total_completion_time: 0.0
  }
}

~~~

* `round` will now be suffixed with `_n` where `n` is from 1 to 5

* added `score`, and `total_completion_time` to `round_*` data 

* `tasks` is now an array. Note it can have null elements because competitors can skip tasks, e.g. `tasks:[null, {current_checkpoint: 0, etc}, null]`

* `checkpoints_completion` is now `checkpoint_durations`

* new `checkpoint_penalties` array in `tasks`
description.html:
Changes made to match the new Task message fields in the new release of srcsim 0.6.0.

Also started monitoring Score data.

Note this PR changes the JSON data that will be posted back to the portal.

      checkpoint_penalties: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
      }, null, null]
    score: 0,
    total_completion_time: 0.0
  }
}

  • round will now be suffixed with _n where n is from 1 to 5

  • added score, and total_completion_time to round_* data

  • tasks is now an array. Note it can have null elements because competitors can skip tasks, e.g. tasks:[null, {current_checkpoint: 0, etc}, null]

  • checkpoints_completion is now checkpoint_durations

  • new checkpoint_penalties array in tasks
